verses.verse: And<WG2532> he entered<WG1525> again<WG3825> into<WG1519> the synagogue<WG4864>; and<WG2532> there was<WG2258> a man<WG444> there<WG1563> which had<WG2192> a withered<WG3583> hand<WG5495>.
And<WG2532> they watched<WG3906> him<WG846>, whether<WG1487> he would heal<WG2323> him<WG846> on the sabbath day<WG4521>; that<WG2443> they might accuse<WG2723> him<WG846>.
And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto the man<WG1519> which had<WG2192> the withered<WG3583> hand<WG5495>, Stand<WG1453> forth<WG444>.

And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> to them<WG846>, Is it lawful<WG1832> to do good<WG15> on the sabbath days<WG4521>, or<WG2228> to do evil<WG2554>? To save<WG4982> life<WG5590>, or<WG2228> to kill<WG615>? But<WG1161> they held their peace<WG4623>.

And<WG2532> when he had looked round about<WG4017> on them<WG846> with<WG3326> anger<WG3709>, being grieved<WG4818> for<WG1909> the hardness<WG4457> of<WG2588> their<WG846> hearts<WG2588>, he said<WG3004> to the man<WG444>, Stretch forth<WG1614> your<WG4675> hand<WG5495>. And<WG2532> he stretched<WG1614> it out<WG1614>: and<WG2532> his<WG846> hand<WG5495> was restored<WG600> whole<WG5199> as<WG5613> the other<WG243>.

And<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> went forth<WG1831>, and directly<WG2112> took<WG4160> counsel<WG4824> with<WG3326> the Herodians<WG2265> against<WG2596> him<WG846>, how<WG3704> they might destroy<WG622> him<WG846>.

But<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> withdrew himself<WG402> with<WG3326> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> to<WG4314> the sea<WG2281>: and<WG2532> a great<WG4183> multitude<WG4128> from<WG575> Galilee<WG1056> followed<WG190> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> from<WG575> Jud√¶a<WG2449>,

And<WG2532> from<WG575> Jerusalem<WG2414>, and<WG2532> from<WG575> Idumaea<WG2401>, and<WG2532> from beyond<WG4008> Jordan<WG2446>; and<WG2532> they<WG3588> about<WG4012> Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605>, a great<WG4183> multitude<WG4128>, when they had heard<WG191> what great things<WG3745> he did<WG4160>, came<WG2064> to<WG4314> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> he spoke<WG2036> to<WG3101> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, that<WG2443> a small boat<WG4142> should wait<WG4342> on him<WG846> because of<WG1223> the multitude<WG3793>, lest<WG2443> they should throng<WG2346> him<WG846>.
For<WG1063> he had healed<WG2323> many<WG4183>; so much that<WG5620> they pressed upon<WG1968> him<WG846> for to<WG2443> touch<WG680> him<WG846>, as many as<WG3745> had<WG2192> plagues<WG3148>.

And<WG2532> unclean<WG169> spirits<WG4151>, when<WG3752> they saw<WG2334> him<WG846>, fell down before<WG4363> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> cried<WG2896>, saying<WG3004>, You<WG4771> are<WG1488> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG3754>.
And<WG2532> he<WG2008> sternly<WG4183> commanded<WG2008> them<WG846> that<WG2443> they should<WG5318> not<WG3361> make<WG4160> him<WG846> known<WG5318>.
And<WG2532> he went up<WG305> into<WG1519> a mountain<WG3735>, and<WG2532> called<WG4341> to him whom<WG3739> he<WG846> would<WG2309>: and<WG2532> they came<WG565> to<WG4314> him<WG846>.
And<WG2532> he ordained<WG4160> twelve<WG1427>, that<WG2443> they should be<WG5600> with<WG3326> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> that<WG2443> he might send<WG649> them<WG846> forth<WG649> to preach<WG2784>,
And<WG2532> to have<WG2192> power<WG1849> to heal<WG2323> sicknesses<WG3554>, and<WG2532> to cast out<WG1544> demons<WG1140>:
And<WG2532> Simon<WG4613> he surnamed<WG3686><WG99999> Peter<WG4074>;

And<WG2532> James<WG2385> the<WG3588> son of Zebedee<WG2199>, and<WG2532> John<WG2491> the brother<WG80> of James<WG2385>; and<WG2532> he<WG2007> surnamed<WG3686> them<WG846> Boanerges<WG993>, which<WG3739> is<WG2076>, The sons<WG5207> of thunder<WG1027>:

And<WG2532> Andrew<WG406>, and<WG2532> Philip<WG5376>, and<WG2532> Bartholomew<WG918>, and<WG2532> Matthew<WG3156>, and<WG2532> Thomas<WG2381>, and<WG2532> James<WG2385> the<WG3588> son of Alphaeus<WG256>, and<WG2532> Thaddaeus<WG2280>, and<WG2532> Simon<WG4613> the Canaanite<WG2581>,
And<WG2532> Judas<WG2455> Iscariot<WG2469>, which<WG3739> also<WG2532> betrayed<WG3860> him<WG846>: and<WG2532> they went<WG2064> into<WG1519> a house<WG3624>.
And<WG2532> the multitude<WG3793> came together<WG4905> again<WG3825>, so that<WG5620> they<WG846> could<WG1410> not<WG3361> so much as<WG3383> eat<WG5315> bread<WG740>.
And<WG2532> when<WG191> his<WG846> friends<WG3844> heard<WG191> of it<WG1831>, they went out to lay hold<WG2902> on him<WG846>: for<WG1063> they said<WG3004>, He is beside himself<WG3754>.

And<WG2532> the scribes<WG1122> which<WG3588> came down<WG2597> from<WG575> Jerusalem<WG2414> said<WG3004>, He has<WG2192> Beelzebub<WG954>, and<WG2532> by<WG1722> the prince<WG758> of the demons<WG1140> casts he out<WG1544> demons<WG3754>.
And<WG2532> he called<WG4341> them<WG846> to him<WG3004>, and said to them<WG846> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850>, How<WG4459> can<WG1410> Satan<WG4567> cast out<WG1544> Satan<WG4567>?
And<WG2532> if<WG1437> a kingdom<WG932> is divided<WG3307> against<WG1909> itself<WG1438>, that<WG1565> kingdom<WG932> cannot<WG3756> stand<WG2476>.
And<WG2532> if<WG1437> a house<WG3614> is divided<WG3307> against<WG1909> itself<WG1438>, that<WG1565> house<WG3614> cannot<WG3756> stand<WG2476>.
And<WG2532> if<WG1487> Satan<WG4567> rises up<WG450> against<WG1909> himself<WG1438>, and<WG2532> is divided<WG3307>, he<WG1410> cannot<WG3756> stand<WG2476>, but<WG235> has<WG2192> an end<WG5056>.

No<WG3756> man<WG3762> can<WG1410> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> a strong man<WG2478>'s house<WG3614>, and plunder<WG1283> his<WG846> goods<WG4632>, except<WG3361> he will<WG1210> first<WG4412> bind<WG1210> the strong man<WG2478>; and<WG2532> then<WG5119> he will plunder<WG1283> his<WG846> house<WG3614>.

Truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you<WG5213>, All<WG3956> sins<WG265> shall be forgiven<WG863> to the sons<WG5207> of men<WG444>, and<WG2532> blasphemies<WG988> with which<WG3745> whatever<WG302> they shall blaspheme<WG3754>:

But<WG1161> he<WG3739> that<WG302> shall blaspheme<WG987> against<WG1519> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> has<WG2192> never<WG1519> forgiveness<WG859>, but<WG235> is<WG2076> in danger<WG1777> of eternal<WG166> damnation<WG2920>:
Because<WG3754> they said<WG3004>, He has<WG2192> an unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151>.

There came<WG2064> then<WG3767> his<WG846> brothers<WG80> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532>, standing<WG2476> outside<WG1854>, sent<WG649> to<WG4314> him<WG846>, calling<WG5455> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> the multitude<WG3793> sat<WG2521> about<WG4012> him<WG846>, and<WG1161> they said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, Behold<WG2400>, your<WG4675> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> your<WG4675> brothers<WG80> outside<WG1854> seek<WG2212> for you<WG4571>.
And<WG2532> he answered<WG611> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Who<WG5101> is<WG2076> my<WG3450> mother<WG3384>, or<WG2228> my<WG3450> brothers<WG80>?
And<WG2532> he looked<WG4017> round about<WG2945> on them which sat<WG2521> about<WG4012> him<WG846>, and said<WG3004>, Behold<WG1492> my<WG3450> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> brothers<WG80>!
For<WG1063> whoever<WG302> shall do<WG4160> the will<WG2307> of God<WG2316>, the same<WG3778> is<WG2076> my<WG3450> brother<WG80>, and<WG2532> my<WG3450> sister<WG79>, and<WG2532> mother<WG3384>.
